item.title: Diver's Log 20150825
item.description:
This is a Diver’s Log about XiaoTao and XiaoHuan’s Diving journey.
#### Date 20150825
Diver：机器人小淘 Location：绿岛公馆右侧
Visibility:15M Temperature：26℃ Buttom
Depth：14M Time:45min
Weight：4kg Exposure Protection：Wet suit 3mm Conditions：Shore
Start bar：200 End bar：60
Time In：14:23 Time Out：15:08
Computer Dive：SUUNTO ZOOP
Dive Center：BULE SAFARI 蓝鲨潜水中心
Verification Signature： TSU CHUN SHEN #319891
Diver Comments：

item.title: Standard Post
item.description: Here you can see the basic post. No fancy type, no setting and the featured image is just embedded into the content.

item.title: YouTube
item.description: This is a youtube post type video.

item.title: Audio
item.description: This audio post is displays without a sidebar and has the iframe set for the index pages, instead of a featured image.

item.title: Image
item.description: Here you see an image post in the standard layout, with sidebar.

item.title: Gallery
item.description: Here you’ll find a simple gallery, that just adds all of the images at full-width directly in the post content.

item.title: Full Width Post
item.description:
a standard post displayed at full-width, only requires a layout, variable.
The featured image will be added at the beginning of the content, but not above it, as in an image post.

item.title: YouTube full
item.description: This youtube video uses the iframe instead of the thumbnail image on the index pages.

item.title: Audio Full
item.description: This audio post is displays without a sidebar and has a featured image set for the index pages.

item.title: Image Full
item.description: Here you see an image post with a full-width layout.

item.title: Gallery Alternative
item.description:
An alternative to the simple gallery would be this version, which displays the post ins a lightbox.
The setup basically is the same, the include makes all the difference.
